objects.name: Bailiff
objects.text: All rise.

objects.name: Bailiff
objects.text: Department One of the Superior Court is now in session. Judge Barrett presiding.

objects.name: Bailiff
objects.text: Please be seated.

objects.name: Judge Barrett
objects.text: Good morning, ladies and gentlemen.

objects.name: Judge Barrett
objects.text: Calling the case of the People of the State of California versus Eduardo Fuentes.

objects.name: Judge Barrett
objects.text: Are both sides ready?

objects.name: Felix
objects.text: Ready for the People, your honor.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: Ready for the People, your honor.

objects.name: Judge Barrett
objects.text: Will the clerk please swear in the jury?

objects.name: Clerk
objects.text: Will the jury please stand and raise your right hand?

objects.name: Clerk
objects.text: Do each of you swear that you will fairly try the case before this court, and that you will return a true verdict according to the evidence and the instructions of the court, so help you, God?

objects.name: Clerk
objects.text: Please say "I do".

objects.name: Jury
objects.text: I do.

objects.name: Clerk
objects.text: You may be seated.

objects.name: Felix
objects.text: Your Honor and ladies and gentlemen of the jury: the defendant has been charged with the crime of murdering the late <color=#ff4d4d>JOSHUA HYLAND</color>.

objects.name: Felix
objects.text: The evidence will show that Joshua's corpse was found was found with a <color=#ff4d4d>stab wound</color>.

objects.name: Felix
objects.text: Mr. Fuentes was found on the crime scene with the murder weapon in his possession.

objects.name: Felix
objects.text: The evidence I present will prove to you that the defendant is guilty as charged.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: Your Honor and ladies and gentlemen of the jury: under the law my client is presumed innocent until proven guilty.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: During this trial, you will discover that there is no real evidence to suggest that Eduardo was the murderer.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: The truth is much simpler: Eduardo was provoked to stab the late Mr. Hyland, but left and returned the crime scene in order to administer proper first aid.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: He had made a mistake, but had tried to do the right thing by trying to save the late Mr. Hyland.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: The evidence I present will show that my client is not guilty.

objects.name: Judge Barrett
objects.text: The prosecution may call its first witness.

objects.name: Felix
objects.text: The People call the brother of the late Mr. Hyland.

objects.name: Clerk
objects.text: Please stand.

objects.name: Clerk
objects.text: Raise your right hand.

objects.name: Clerk
objects.text: Do you promise that the testimony you shall give in the case before this court shall be the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth, so help you God?

objects.name: Gabriel
objects.text: I most certainly do.

objects.name: Clerk
objects.text: Please state your first and last name.

objects.name: Gabriel
objects.text: I am Gabriel Hyland.

objects.name: Clerk
objects.text: You may be seated.

objects.name: Felix
objects.text: Gabriel, where do you work?

objects.name: Gabriel
objects.text: I am the current State Senator for California's 26th District.

objects.name: Felix
objects.text: Where were you on April 4th, 2014?

objects.name: Gabriel
objects.text: I was in <color=#ff4d4d>Warehouse Six</color> on the NWW Studios filming lot.

objects.name: Felix
objects.text: To your knowledge, where was Joshua and Mr. Fuentes on that day?

objects.name: Gabriel
objects.text: I had sent Eduardo to deal with Joshua at <color=#ff4d4d>Warehouse Four</color>, I think.

objects.name: Felix
objects.text: Gabriel, have you observed Mr. Fuentes openly carrying his <color=#ff4d4d>tactical knife</color>?

objects.name: Gabriel
objects.text: Yes. Eduardo has always kept his knife visible to the public.

objects.name: Felix
objects.text: What time did you spot Joshua's dead body?

objects.name: Gabriel
objects.text: I think around <color=#ff4d4d>7:20 PM</color>?
